entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then periods of snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
